chatGpt.secret: Chat GPT Secret Key Goes Here
chatGpt.dialoguePrompt: Generate a comedy conversation between Spongebob, Patrick, and Squidward no longer than 1 minute. It needs to be formatted as Name: "Dialogue Here". The topic is: <topic>
chatGpt.topicPrompt: Generate a random one sentence sitcom topic

fakeYou.jwt: The JWT token you get from the session cookie. Log in to the website, head over to your browser dev tools, and grab the token from the session cookie. The value you paste here should be decodable by https://jwt.io/

mongoDb.connectionString: mongodb+srv://<username>:<password>@xxx.xxx.mongodb.net/   Replace with your own mongoDB connection string
